name: Champions League Soccer (joysmashgames)
description:
If you are in love with soccer and love to compete with the most up to dated players and teams, champions league is the right soccer game.
This game has 3 modes:

1- Friendly 
Train and learn how to play and choose your favorite team with the desired formation.

2- Champions League
Choose your team between 32 current champions league teams and start to play in 8 groups each of which has 4 teams (the same as real champions league). Defeat all the other teams and pass the elimination group to reach to the Final and win the Cup.

3- Persian League:
Choose your favorite team from 16 teams in persian league and remain in the top.

We hope this game gives you a good time
